example.name: with thing coped with
example.text: ``Our company has not been able *trace* to cope very effectively with'' changes in the marketplace, said Ryosuke Ito, Sansui's president.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Despite all the pharmaceutical help, John just couldn't cope.
